club.NAME: Equinox Club
club.description: Equinox Club, is a vibrant community within the Computer Science & Engineering Department, cultivates innovation and skill development among the students. Through workshops, coding competitions, and hackathons, it fosters a passion for technology.

club.NAME: Illuminati Club
club.description: Illuminati Club, an enthusiastic community within the IT Department, nurturing innovation and empowering skill development of students in IT field through coding competition, workshops , code golf, hackathons, project talks and quizzes.

club.NAME: Media Relations Club
club.description: Media Relations Club , specializes in gathering, curating, and disseminating information to its audience, also students hone their communication skills, and learns to engage with various forms of media with a dedicated team of students.

club.NAME: Design Club
club.description: The Design club ignites passion for creativity, fostering a supportive environment for members to explore diverse mediums, share inspiration, and collaborate, enriching the artistic community through expression and innovation.

club.NAME: Literary Club
club.description: The Literary Club is comprised of a passionate group of individuals dedicated to fostering a love for literature through engaging discussions, and captivating events. We delve into literature through discussions, writing challenges, and events, nurturing a love for reading and storytelling.

club.NAME: Pharmquimica Club
club.description: The pharmacy club offers a collaborative environment for students and professionals to exchange knowledge, advance skills, and promote health education, ensuring excellence and innovation in pharmaceutical practice.

club.NAME: Management Club
club.description: The management club provides a vibrant platform for members to enhance leadership skills, cultivate professional networks, and drive innovation, fostering growth and excellence within the industry.

club.NAME: Robotrax Club
club.description: The Robotrax Club unites enthusiasts in robotics, AI, and automation, providing a space for collaboration, knowledge sharing, and hands-on projects, fostering innovation and advancing technology in the field

club.NAME: Aeronautics Club
club.description: Aeronautics Club,a dynamic force within the Mechanical Department, ignites student's passion for flight.Through workshops, design challenges, and competitions, it bridges the gap between classroom theory and real-world applications.

club.NAME: Synergy Club
club.description: The Synergy club ignites passion for technology, fostering knowledge exchange, hands-on experimentation, and innovation in electronic design, empowering members to drive advancements and shape the future of electronics

club.NAME: LAN Games
club.description: LAN games provide immersive, social experiences for gamers, promoting camaraderie, competition, and skill development in a vibrant community atmosphere, enhancing teamwork and strategic thinking among participants.

club.NAME: Open Events
club.description: These events are innovative events oragnised by TYRO Club.
